name: Hey
description: A ulauncher extension allowing you to query chatGPT-4, LLama, and claude

preferences.name: hey
preferences.description: Keyword to trigger the hey extension

preferences.name: Default Model
preferences.description: Default model to use when communicating with hey

preferences.name: System Prompt
preferences.description: Provide a system prompt to overwrite what is in your particular modelfile
preferences.default_value: You are an inline assitant, keep your responses short and sweet.
